welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sunland Park, a charming city known for its stunning views and rich culture. We invite you to explore and truly experience all that our vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Biggs AAF Airport is dedicated to serving military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at El Paso International Airport primarily serves American Airlines and American Eagle flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at El Paso International Airport serves United and Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
